examples.en: Supreme Court

examples.en: John and Mary court in secret.
John is courting Mary.
International Court of Justice
The court will not hear this case.
examples.ru: Суд не будет заслушивать это дело.

examples.en: The court is dark today.
The case was thrown out of court.
examples.ru: Делу было отказано в рассмотрении в суде.

examples.en: He failed to appear in court.
He's a tiger on the tennis court.
examples.ru: На теннисном корте он просто зверь.

examples.en: Supreme Court of the United States
Central Criminal Court
— Silence in court! — roared the judge.
Several members of the court were under suspicion.
examples.ru: Под подозрением находились некоторые представители королевского двора.

examples.en: He speaks for the court.
He is an officer of the court.
The court handed down an opinion.
They settled the case out of court.
examples.ru: Они решили дело, не обращаясь в суд.

examples.en: Strasbourg Court
Will his story stand up in court?
examples.ru: Поверят ли его рассказу в суде?

examples.en: The contract was annulled by the court.
The court froze their assets.
I received a summons to appear in court.
Court is now in session.
She is keen to avoid a court case.
Court is adjourned for the day.
We plan to appeal the court's decision.
examples.ru: Мы намерены обжаловать данное решение суда.

examples.en: The court adjourned.

High Court of Justiciary

examples.ru: Было вынесено решение о помещении Алекса под опеку суда.
